mapper.insert: insert into tb_order_history(id, create_time, desk_num, order_type, remarks, status_str) values(#{id}, #{createTime}, #{deskNum}, #{orderType}, #{remarks}, #{statusStr})
mapper.select: select id, create_time, desk_num, order_type, remarks, status_str from tb_order_history order by id desc limit #{begin}, #{end}
select id, create_time, desk_num, order_type, remarks, status_str from tb_order_history where id = #{id}
